comments.body: my previous attempt had a warning here. should we have one?

Depends on what we are trying to warn about. Not having a kube-proxy config map should be perfectly acceptable in my opinion, but we may warn the users, that they are on their own if they choose to manage the proxy addon by themselves.
yeah i think we should warn something in the lines of that if the CM is missing or forbidden the users are on their own managing the addon.
